mapper.sql: SELECT t1.BCDR, t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.DEID, t11.DENAME, t1.DSTORGID, t21.ORGNAME AS DSTORGNAME, t1.DSTORGSECTORID, t31.ORGSECTORNAME AS DSTORGSECTORNAME, t1.DSTSECBC, t1.ISALLDATA, t1.MEMO, t1.ORGDR, t1.RESERVER, t1.RESERVER2, t1.RESERVER3, t1.RESERVER4, t1.SECDR, t1.SRFSYSPUB, t1.SRFUSERPUB, t1.UDVERSION, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.USERDR, t1.USERROLEDATAID, t1.USERROLEDATANAME FROM T_SRFUSERROLEDATA t1 LEFT JOIN t_srfdataentity t11 ON t1.DEID = t11.DEID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t21 ON t1.DSTORGID = t21.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t31 ON t1.DSTORGSECTORID = t31.ORGSECTORID

SELECT t1.`BCDR`, t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`DEID`, t11.`DENAME`, t1.`DSTORGID`, t31.`ORGNAME` AS `DSTORGNAME`, t1.`DSTORGSECTORID`, t21.`ORGSECTORNAME` AS `DSTORGSECTORNAME`, t1.`DSTSECBC`, t1.`ISALLDATA`, t1.`MEMO`, t1.`ORGDR`, t1.`RESERVER`, t1.`RESERVER2`, t1.`RESERVER3`, t1.`RESERVER4`, t1.`SECDR`, t1.`SRFSYSPUB`, t1.`SRFUSERPUB`, t1.`UDVERSION`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t1.`USERDR`, t1.`USERROLEDATAID`, t1.`USERROLEDATANAME` FROM `T_USERROLEDATA` t1 LEFT JOIN T_dataentity t11 ON t1.DEID = t11.DEID LEFT JOIN T_ORGSECTOR t21 ON t1.DSTORGSECTORID = t21.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_ORG t31 ON t1.DSTORGID = t31.ORGID

SELECT t1.BCDR, t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.DEID, t11.DENAME, t1.DSTORGID, t31.ORGNAME AS DSTORGNAME, t1.DSTORGSECTORID, t21.ORGSECTORNAME AS DSTORGSECTORNAME, t1.DSTSECBC, t1.ISALLDATA, t1.MEMO, t1.ORGDR, t1.RESERVER, t1.RESERVER2, t1.RESERVER3, t1.RESERVER4, t1.SECDR, t1.SRFSYSPUB, t1.SRFUSERPUB, t1.UDVERSION, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.USERDR, t1.USERROLEDATAID, t1.USERROLEDATANAME FROM T_SRFUSERROLEDATA t1 LEFT JOIN t_srfdataentity t11 ON t1.DEID = t11.DEID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t21 ON t1.DSTORGSECTORID = t21.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t31 ON t1.DSTORGID = t31.ORGID

SELECT t1.BCDR AS BCDR, t1.CREATEDATE AS CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN AS CREATEMAN, t1.DEID AS DEID, t11.DENAME AS DENAME, t1.DSTORGID AS DSTORGID, t21.ORGNAME AS DSTORGNAME, t1.DSTORGSECTORID AS DSTORGSECTORID, t31.ORGSECTORNAME AS DSTORGSECTORNAME, t1.DSTSECBC AS DSTSECBC, t1.ISALLDATA AS ISALLDATA, t1.MEMO AS MEMO, t1.ORGDR AS ORGDR, t1.RESERVER AS RESERVER, t1.RESERVER2 AS RESERVER2, t1.RESERVER3 AS RESERVER3, t1.RESERVER4 AS RESERVER4, t1.SECDR AS SECDR, t1.SRFSYSPUB AS SRFSYSPUB, t1.SRFUSERPUB AS SRFUSERPUB, t1.UDVERSION AS UDVERSION, t1.UPDATEDATE AS UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN AS UPDATEMAN, t1.USERDR AS USERDR, t1.USERROLEDATAID AS USERROLEDATAID, t1.USERROLEDATANAME AS USERROLEDATANAME FROM T_SRFUSERROLEDATA t1 LEFT JOIN t_srfdataentity t11 ON t1.DEID = t11.DEID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t21 ON t1.DSTORGID = t21.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t31 ON t1.DSTORGSECTORID = t31.ORGSECTORID

SELECT t1.BCDR AS BCDR, t1.CREATEDATE AS CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN AS CREATEMAN, t1.DEID AS DEID, t11.DENAME AS DENAME, t1.DSTORGID AS DSTORGID, t21.ORGNAME AS DSTORGNAME, t1.DSTORGSECTORID AS DSTORGSECTORID, t31.ORGSECTORNAME AS DSTORGSECTORNAME, t1.DSTSECBC AS DSTSECBC, t1.ISALLDATA AS ISALLDATA, t1.MEMO AS MEMO, t1.ORGDR AS ORGDR, t1.RESERVER AS RESERVER, t1.RESERVER2 AS RESERVER2, t1.RESERVER3 AS RESERVER3, t1.RESERVER4 AS RESERVER4, t1.SECDR AS SECDR, t1.SRFSYSPUB AS SRFSYSPUB, t1.SRFUSERPUB AS SRFUSERPUB, t1.UDVERSION AS UDVERSION, t1.UPDATEDATE AS UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN AS UPDATEMAN, t1.USERDR AS USERDR, t1.USERROLEDATAID AS USERROLEDATAID, t1.USERROLEDATANAME AS USERROLEDATANAME FROM T_SRFUSERROLEDATA t1 LEFT JOIN t_srfdataentity t11 ON t1.DEID = t11.DEID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t21 ON t1.DSTORGID = t21.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t31 ON t1.DSTORGSECTORID = t31.ORGSECTORID

SELECT t1.[BCDR], t1.[CREATEDATE], t1.[CREATEMAN], t1.[DEID], t11.[DENAME], t1.[DSTORGID], t21.[ORGNAME] AS [DSTORGNAME], t1.[DSTORGSECTORID], t31.[ORGSECTORNAME] AS [DSTORGSECTORNAME], t1.[DSTSECBC], t1.[ISALLDATA], t1.[MEMO], t1.[ORGDR], t1.[RESERVER], t1.[RESERVER2], t1.[RESERVER3], t1.[RESERVER4], t1.[SECDR], t1.[SRFSYSPUB], t1.[SRFUSERPUB], t1.[UDVERSION], t1.[UPDATEDATE], t1.[UPDATEMAN], t1.[USERDR], t1.[USERROLEDATAID], t1.[USERROLEDATANAME] FROM [T_SRFUSERROLEDATA] t1 LEFT JOIN t_srfdataentity t11 ON t1.DEID = t11.DEID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t21 ON t1.DSTORGID = t21.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t31 ON t1.DSTORGSECTORID = t31.ORGSECTORID
